output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an overflow of the total supply due to a missing check on the minted amount.
The transferFrom function has a wrong logic where it returns false if the balances or allowances are insufficient, allowing unauthorized transfers.
The ToOwner function can be called by anyone, allowing unauthorized access to the contract.
The mintToken function allows the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens, devaluing the token.
The claimThrone function has an integer overflow where the balance is updated without preventing overflow.
